Measurement Type: Embodied CO2 (or other global warming gases)

Full Name: Metric tonne of CO2e per kilogram of product or material
Measurement Type: Embodied CO2 (or other global warming gases)

Full Name: Squared coulomb per newton meter squared

Definition (if required): Potentially Disappeared Fraction of species over a certain area over a certain time.
One DALY represents the loss of the equivalent of one year of full health.

The characterization factor for aquatic ecotoxicity impacts (ecotoxicity potential) is expressed in comparative toxic units (CTUe), an estimate of the potentially affected fraction of species (PAF) integrated over time and volume, per unit mass of a chemical emitted.

The characterization factor for human toxicity impacts (human toxicity potential) is expressed in comparative toxic units (CTUh), the estimated increase in morbidity in the total human population, per unit mass of a chemical emitted, assuming equal weighting between cancer and non-cancer due to a lack of more precise insights into this issue.
A unit of radioactivity equal to one thousand becquerels.
It is the common unit used to measure heating content and the value of a fuel.

Measurement Type: Embodied CO2 (or other global warming gases)
Definition (if required): Earth's carbon pools - the oceans, atmosphere, land, and living things - and is typically measured in units of gigatonnes of carbon per year (GtC/yr)
Land use occupation is measured as area time (m2a).

Measurement Type: Embodied CO2 (or other global warming gases)
